commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I wasn't expecting it to be a haunted house...

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I-I would've refused if I knew it was!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wanted to gather some data from scaredy-cats as well, so you had to be one of my subjects, Ruby. Rina-chan Board says, "Tense."

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Don't you "tense" me!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Th-The tricks and traps are all fake anyway, Ruby! It's not so scary once you realize that.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You do not sound nearly as convincing as you should when you say it in such a shaky voice.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But it's scary when you're the only one who can hear the voices...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Well, it is a haunted house, so I suppose you could say that it's doing a good job. Perhaps it might be a little too frightening for small children?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's okay. This attraction has an age limit on it.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: That means this isn't just your average haunted house, then...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: My relative said they made it super scary.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Urk... Would it have hurt them to put a little less effort in?

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: EEEEEEEEK!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That was only the sound of the wind just now. It had nothing to do with the attraction.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Th-That scared the living daylights out of me...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You screamed as well, Kasumi. Shouldn't you be used to these sounds?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I was just startled by all of your voices!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Kasumi, you can just admit it if you're scared, you know? Everyone's scared, so you're not alone here.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Waaahhh, Kotori!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Go into that classroom next.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We're already heading into the next scary bit?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: These here...are rows of Japanese dolls packed together... Seeing so many in one spot is quite creepy, indeed.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: C-Can I leave now?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Look at that doll's eyes! They're following our every movement, aren't they?!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: EEEEEEK!!!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I-I can't take this anymore!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait, Ruby! Don't run off on your own! You can't leave me behind!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Oh. Off she goes...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: These are all fake, these are all fake... I can probably get through this if I just keep thinking that to myself. It's still terrifying, though.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm not getting the reaction I want. Maybe it's not effective because it doesn't move? I'll improve it so that it laughs while it creeps up towards you.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Y-You don't have to make those kinds of improvements!
